features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy; Articulated knees
Dryride two-layer fabric[10,000mm/5,000g]is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick drying; PFC-free DWR coating
Fully-taped seams create the ultimate seal against foul weather
Thermacore insulation[60g]for focused warmth and enhanced breathability; Nylon taffeta lining
Room-to-Grow system extends the length of the legs by 1.5in to keep up with growth spurts
Anti-scuff cuffs with hook-and-loop cuff elevators; Water-resistant boot gaiter
External hook-and-loop waistband adjustment; Belt-loop ticket O-ring
Zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets and back pockets with hook-and-loop closure
